product_name: Picnic At Ascot 4 Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket
long_description: For your next gourmet picnic off the beaten track, invite your 3 favorite foodies and bring along the fully equipped 4-Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket from Picnic at Ascot.
short_description: For your next gourmet picnic off the beaten track, invite your 3 favorite foodies and bring along the fully equipped 4-Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket from Picnic at Ascot.
